I am Antonio Ãšbeda Montero, a self-taught frontend web developer with more than 20 years of experience, specialized in Angular, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3 and Node.js.

Throughout my career I have worked on projects for large companies such as Banco Santander and SegurCaixa, applying agile methodologies such as Scrum and Lean, and good development practices such as Clean Code and design patterns.

I focus on building accessible, search engine optimized (SEO) and high-performance interfaces, using semantic HTML and responsive design
